titleNullable: 4 million Amazon Reviews for Sentiment Analysis.
subtitleNullable: The popular fastText format converted to csv format
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset consists of a 3.6 million and 0.4 million Amazon customer reviews (input text) for training and testing respectively and labels for these reviews (output labels).


### Content

* train.csv: A csv file with each review classified in the label as "1" or "2". [3600000 entries]
* test.csv: A csv file with each review classified in the label as "1" or "2". [400000 entires]

1 : Negative
2 : Positive

### Acknowledgements

This dataset is a csv format of the dataset [Amazon Reviews for Sentiment Analysis](https://www.kaggle.com/bittlingmayer/amazonreviews).


### Inspiration

This data is enormous yet giving an insight of how to handle big data while training models and predictors.
